name: Halfords Essentials Rear Reflector
description: The Halfords Essentials Rear Reflector easily fits to the seat post to ensure you can be seen on the road. It comes with a bracket to attach to the post.

name: Halfords Essentials Front Bike Reflector
description: The Halfords Essentials Front Bike Reflector adds some extra visibility to your bike. It easily fits onto your bike's handlebars and the fitting bracket is included.

name: Halfords Essentials Wheel Spoke Reflectors
description: The Halfords Essentials Wheel Spoke Reflectors easily clip over the spokes on your wheel to provide extra visibility to others on the road. Not only do they look great but they also improve your bikes safety!
